sections.title: Context & Role in Aegis IAM
sections.goal: Understand interviewee's specific responsibilities, security domain focus, and how they interact with data strategy in IAM context.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your primary responsibilities on Aegis IAM?
How does your work intersect with the data flows in the IAM system?
What are the most critical security controls you oversee day-to-day?

sections.title: Threat Modeling & Vulnerability Management
sections.goal: Explore how threats are identified, modeled, and mitigated within the IAM project, and how vulnerability management processes are executed.
sample_questions: How do you approach threat modeling for new IAM features?
Can you give an example of a vulnerability lifecycle from discovery to resolution in Aegis IAM?
What tools or frameworks are you using to manage vulnerabilities across environments?

sections.title: Least Privilege & JIT Access Implementation
sections.goal: Dive into the specifics of implementing POL-SEC-001 in Aegis IAM, including policies, runbooks, and cross-team coordination.
sample_questions: What challenges have you faced implementing least privilege and JIT access?
How do you verify compliance with POL-SEC-001 in production?
Can you describe an incident where JIT access significantly reduced risk?

sections.title: Cross-System Dependencies & Data Strategy
sections.goal: Identify non-trivial links between IAM, other systems, and data strategy, particularly in terms of audit, analytics, and incident response.
sample_questions: How does the IAM audit trail integrate with observability or data lake systems?
Can you detail a scenario where IAM data was essential for resolving a cross-system incident?
What are the data retention and privacy considerations in these integrations?

sections.title: Decision-Making & Tradeoffs in Security Controls
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee evaluates tradeoffs between security, usability, and operational efficiency, with concrete evidence from runbooks, tickets, or audits.
sample_questions: Can you describe a decision where you had to balance tighter access controls with user experience?
What evidence did you rely on to justify this decision?
How did you measure the impact and communicate it to stakeholders?

sections.title: Future Risks & Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Explore anticipated risks, evolving threat landscape, and how continuous improvement is embedded in IAM operations.
sample_questions: What emerging threats do you foresee impacting IAM in the next 12 months?
How are you preparing to address them?
What continuous improvement loops are in place for security posture?
